title: Jeff Zucker’s Downfall at CNN: Ethical Lapses and Falling Ratings - The New York Times
content:
1. Jeff Zucker’s Downfall at CNN: Ethical Lapses and Falling Ratings  The New York Times
  2. Top CNN exec resigns as WarnerMedia chief accuses her and former network boss Zucker of standards violations  CNN
  3. Allison Gollust, CNN exec in affair with Zucker, resigns after probe finds 'issues associated' with Cuomo brothers  New York Post
  4. Stocks, Earnings and Business News: Live Updates  The New York Times
  5. Allison Gollust resigns from CNN following Jeff Zucker ouster  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The network’s top-rated host and its president were forced out following ethical lapses, an office romance and a letter from a lawyer for “Jane Doe.”
